                "std::hexfloat",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  ["a", "http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/io/manip/fixed"]
                ]
              ],
              [" [C++11] and "],
              [
                "std::defaultfloat",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  ["a", "http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/io/manip/fixed"]
                ]
              ],
              [" [C++11] - change formatting for floating-point input/output."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

                "#include <cmath>\n#include <limits>\n...\n\ntypedef std::numeric_limits<long double> ld;\nconst long double pi = std::acos(-1.L);\n\nstd::cout << '\\n'\n          << \"default precision (6):   pi: \" << pi << '\\n'\n          << \"                       10pi: \" << 10 * pi << '\\n'\n          << \"std::setprecision(4):  10pi: \" << std::setprecision(4) << 10 * pi << '\\n'\n          << \"                    10000pi: \" << 10000 * pi << '\\n'\n          << \"std::fixed:         10000pi: \" << std::fixed << 10000 * pi << std::defaultfloat << '\\n'\n          << \"std::setprecision(10):   pi: \" << std::setprecision(10) << pi << '\\n'\n          << \"max-1 radix precicion:   pi: \" << std::setprecision(ld::digits - 1) << pi << '\\n'\n          << \"max+1 radix precision:   pi: \" << std::setprecision(ld::digits + 1) << pi << '\\n'\n          << \"significant digits prec: pi: \" << std::setprecision(ld::digits10) << pi << '\\n';\n\n// Output:\n// default precision (6):   pi: 3.14159\n//                        10pi: 31.4159\n// std::setprecision(4):  10pi: 31.42\n//                     10000pi: 3.142e+04\n// std::fixed:         10000pi: 31415.9265\n// std::setprecision(10):   pi: 3.141592654\n// max-1 radix precicion:   pi: 3.14159265358979323851280895940618620443274267017841339111328125\n// max+1 radix precision:   pi: 3.14159265358979323851280895940618620443274267017841339111328125\n// significant digits prec: pi: 3.14159265358979324"

                "std::istringstream in(\"10 010 10 010 10 010\");\nint num1, num2;\n\nin >> std::oct >> num1 >> num2;\nstd::cout << \"Parsing \\\"10 010\\\" with std::oct gives:   \" << num1 << ' ' << num2 << '\\n';\n// Output: Parsing \"10 010\" with std::oct gives:   8 8\n\nin >> std::dec >> num1 >> num2;\nstd::cout << \"Parsing \\\"10 010\\\" with std::dec gives:   \" << num1 << ' ' << num2 << '\\n';\n// Output: Parsing \"10 010\" with std::oct gives:   10 10\n\nin >> std::resetiosflags(std::ios_base::basefield) >> num1 >> num2;\nstd::cout << \"Parsing \\\"10 010\\\" with autodetect gives: \" << num1 << ' ' << num2 << '\\n';\n// Parsing \"10 010\" with autodetect gives: 10 8\n\nstd::cout << std::setiosflags(std::ios_base::hex |\n                              std::ios_base::uppercase |\n                              std::ios_base::showbase) << 42 << '\\n';\n// Output: OX2A"

              [
                "#include <sstream>\n...\n\nchar c1, c2, c3;\nstd::istringstream(\"a b c\") >> c1 >> c2 >> c3;\nstd::cout << \"Default  behavior:  c1 = \" << c1 << \"  c2 = \" << c2 << \"  c3 = \" << c3 << '\\n';\n\nstd::istringstream(\"a b c\") >> std::noskipws >> c1 >> c2 >> c3;\nstd::cout << \"noskipws behavior:  c1 = \" << c1 << \"  c2 = \" << c2 << \"  c3 = \" << c3 << '\\n';\n// Output: Default  behavior:  c1 = a  c2 = b  c3 = c\n// noskipws behavior:  c1 = a  c2 =    c3 = b"

            ]

                "http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/io/manip/booalpha",

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["C++"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "#include <sstream>\n...\n \nstd::stringstream ss;\nstd::string in = \"String with spaces, and embedded \\\"quotes\\\" too\";\nstd::string out;\n \nss << std::quoted(in);\nstd::cout << \"read in     [\" << in << \"]\\n\"\n          << \"stored as   [\" << ss.str() << \"]\\n\";\n \nss >> std::quoted(out);\nstd::cout << \"written out [\" << out << \"]\\n\";\n// Output:\n// read in     [String with spaces, and embedded \"quotes\" too]\n// stored as   [\"String with spaces, and embedded \\\"quotes\\\" too\"]\n// written out [String with spaces, and embedded \"quotes\" too]"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "std::quoted(s[, delim[, escape]])",
                [
                  ["c"],
                  ["a", "http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/io/manip/quoted"]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " [C++14] - inserts or extracts quoted strings with embedded spaces. "
              ],
              ["s", [["c"]]],
              [" - the string to insert or extract. "],
              ["delim", [["c"]]],
              [" - the character to use as the delimiter, "],
              ["\"", [["c"]]],
              [" by default. "],
              ["escape", [["c"]]],
              [" - the character to use as the escape character, "],
              ["\\\\", [["c"]]],
              [" by default."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
